markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 380 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Anubis](/Deities.aspx?ID=511), [Good Neighbors](/Deities.aspx?ID=368), [Kols](/Deities.aspx?ID=449), [Monad](/Deities.aspx?ID=541), [Yelayne](/Deities.aspx?ID=630)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained
</row>

</column>

---

You summon an unseen servant, which you can command as part of Sustaining the Spell. It serves you until its Hit Points are reduced to 0, at which point the spell ends, or until you stop Sustaining the Spell. The unseen servant gains the summoned trait.

<document level="2" id="creature-1" />
name: Unseen Servant

</summary>
summary: Create an invisible creature to help you.
summary_markdown: Create an invisible creature to help you.
text: Unseen Servant Three Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 380 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Anubis, Good Neighbors, Kols, Monad, Yelayne Cast material, somatic, verbal Range 60 feet Duration sustained --- You summon an unseen servant, which you can command as part of Sustaining the Spell. It serves you until its Hit Points are reduced to 0, at which point the spell ends, or until you stop Sustaining the Spell. The unseen servant gains the summoned trait.
